org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster

Class ClusterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.ClusterController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.activemq.core.server.ActiveMQComponent

    public class ClusterController
extends Object
implements org.apache.activemq.core.server.ActiveMQComponent
    used for creating and managing cluster control connections for each cluster connection and the replication connection
